column4: hi, why I can't connect to my yahoo messenger with Kopete on Kubuntu ? There sais "connecting" but he doesn't connect !
i recall a few weeks back Yahoo changes domthing that broke a lot of the unofficial clients. The fix was to use some other yahoo login server.. but thats about all i rember on the topic
but what can I use so I can receive and give webcam ? pidgin doesn't have that.
not a clue. I dont use IM or pidgin or webcams -  skype can do video i recall
